title: Ep 124 - FBI Profiler Candice DeLong
description:
The boys talk about how each spent their Thanksgiving holiday and then they have a chat with retired FBI Criminal Profiler Candice DeLong.

Candice is the author of Special Agent: My Life on the Front Lines as a Woman in the FBI and talks about her time spent on the Unabomber investigation as well as her thoughts on the Lacy Peterson, Casey Anthony and Jon Brent Ramsey investigations.

Candice is the host of Deadly Women and  Facing Evil on Investigation Discovery. Watch those shows and check out her book at

https://www.amazon.com/Special-Agent-Front-Lines-Woman/dp/0786867078
